titles: GratI Falisci Cynegeticon. Or, A poem of hunting by Gratius the Faliscian. Englished and illustrated by Christopher Wase Gent.
author: Grattius, Faliscus.
Wase, Christopher, 1625?-1690.
publisher: Printed for Charles Adams, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Talbot neare St. Dunstans Church in Fleet Street.,
notes: The poem has Latin and English texts on facing pages.
"Certaine illustrations of the Cynegeticall poem of Gratius" begins pagination on C6r.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
